metadata.title: USN-4215-1 -- NSS vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that NSS incorrectly handled certain certificates. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4215-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnss3-dev - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.6 libnss3 - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.6 libnss3-tools - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.6 No subscription required
